entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
